title: RAG + Building a WordPress Site From Scratch
description: Join us for two dynamic sessions: Learn practical RAG implementation to bring your own data to AI for smarter responses, followed by an entertaining 60-minute challenge to build a complete WordPress site from scratch. From AI innovation to web development mastery!
venue: Accso South Africa, Clock Tower, V&A Waterfront

title: Programming with Agents Without It Going Off in Weird Directions
description: Explore how to work effectively with AI coding agents like GitHub Copilot so they stay on track across sessions, multiple contributors, and complex projects. Learn practical strategies for consistent, high-quality results with a live demo.

title: CPTMSDUG - Games Night
description: Join us for the annual CPTMSDUG Games Night! End the year with fun, games, and prizes. Details about specific games and prizes to be announced soon.
venue: Accso South Africa, Clock Tower, V&A Waterfront (pending confirmation)

title: .NET Conf 2025 South Africa Community Edition
description: Join us for the annual .NET Conf celebration across three major South African cities! Experience the latest in .NET development, connect with fellow developers, and celebrate the .NET community. Event details to be announced soon.

title: .NET Conf 2025 SA - MSDUG Community Edition
description: MSDUG Community Edition - Coming Soon to Cape Town and Johannesburg

features.title: Technical Sessions
features.description: In-depth technical presentations covering .NET 10 features, performance enhancements, new APIs, and real-world implementations from local and international speakers.

features.title: Hands-on Workshops
features.description: Interactive workshops where you can get hands-on experience with .NET 10's new features, tools, and development patterns. Bring your laptop and code along!

features.title: Panel Discussions
features.description: Engaging panel discussions with industry experts about .NET 10's impact on development, the future of .NET ecosystem, and career growth in South Africa.

features.title: Networking Breaks
features.description: Dedicated networking time with refreshments, giving you the opportunity to connect with other developers and potential collaborators.
